hadiths.text: Narrated Aisha, Ummul Mu'minin: The Prophet (ﷺ) said: When one of you becomes defiled during prayer, he should hold his nose and then turn away. Abu Dawud said: This tradition has been narrated by Hammad b. Salamah and Abu Usamah from Hisham on the authority of his father from the Prophet (Saws). They did not mention the name of 'Aishah

chapter.eng-name: Should The One Who Commits Hadath (Breaks His Wudu') Ask Permission From The Imam To Leave ?
